biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Jeremy Patrick Howard (born June 12, 1981) is an American actor. He appeared in the films Sydney White, Galaxy Quest, and Accepted.

Howard was born in Burbank, California, the son of Sharon Hess and actor Joe Howard.
